twitch_info.title: Crimson Needle 2.5 - #9
twitch_info.description: we find two more secrets tonight!

message.body: Wow I can’t believe it’s finally out
I see you found the secret that required you not to touch walls
i would always immediatly recognize that, floor 73019.2
all needle is think needle. Because you have to have a brain to complete needle
i mean like, out of the 1140782 screens in the game, youre getting there
how many crimson needle in crimson needle?????
what’s your favorite secret so far?
if you remember the hint in one of the first screens in the game, look ahead
Framzo subscribed at Tier 1. They've subscribed for 52 months!
Dullsonic3 subscribed at Tier 1. They've subscribed for 4 months!
I want to get in the secret business but the main game is kinda being my worst needle experience of recent times
doing good, playing a beta of a hype game
tho my friends couldn't get in so i have to carry randos
has anyone started school yet? it starts tomorrow for me
also includes a bunch of math lectures
like, took an algebra exam a week ago
the 2 more screens of needle without any saves:
it's like decently hard and isn't being a lot of  fun, like the last 5 or so floors I had to force myself to play and each time I was not looking forward to the next save
maybe hate is a strong word for it but i definitely dont like writing sql queries
incorrect gravity arrows sounds like an awesome idea
I did not see that reference!
actually it's an ancient greece reference
but yeah exam also includes relational algebra, drc, trc and normalization
domain relational calculus, tuple relational calculus
either way, its basically just more ways to write database queries
theyre just not used in practice but rather on a theoretical level
this was the first secret i did
someone knew about the hint on floor 49
so then we just messed around until we solved it
how did you play this screen first when there are a bunch of screens before this in the secret
oh yeah also what is the image behind chat etc
yeah cant tell thats jerma at all with the time being right in front of the face
spoiler: this tileset appears on floor 52 of cn2.5
this is how big every screen will be in 10 years
they will be stealing from our needle by making the screens smaller
reminds me that someone asked me to solve a jump this morning
which is weird considering its the first jump in a new precision game
i mean it looks neat, at least visually
itd just be weird if the very first jump already wasnt tested
oh right for this one you have to type the secret password from the manual
did you not buy it on release?
or did you lose the manual
That platform is clearly part of the lgbtq+ community
wait until you hear that you missed a 1 px platform on the bottom left corner
i just realized that my dumbass password prompt talk would be correct with regard to the platforms
spoiler: the solution to this puzzle is unknown to me
what if there is no secret and all this is just a troll
tomorrow ill be free of that
random thing  I realized, if you shift cancel you can jump into a vine and keep your double jump
ftr i did actually not know
oh my god i forgot the channel point currency name and got jumpscared
when twitch hits you with the you have 90k avoidance clears
this is something people would post about being a secret route in deltarune and noone would believe it until checking for themselves that its real
you should say en whenever you say breaks
the password is in the manual etc
the same one as the one you beat earlier
what if you need the right align to fit in a hole in the ceiling
itd be pretty messed up if the answer was get rid of the block and then the platforms
that seems incorrect considering the second platform disappears
opinion on latest post in memes?
oh right it just makes that an emote
im always annoyed by it when it happens
can only think of going left when rising up
on my end i said it while you were messing around and like 2s later you went and tried exactly that
did you solve The Pull of the Ceiling on the right
woah the screen becomes lgbt lights
if only you had the manual...
it just said blue on the screen after you died does that matter?
the red warp means you have to enter it during a blood moon
could it be a platform code again since the platforms are vanishing after you touch them?
what if you use all platforms
what would be kale's favorite color
Are you still trying to get to the secret
if thats not it im stumped
damn waking up late made me miss a lot
how has secret hunting been going
ig go immediatly and maybe its a hint that theres an invisible warp there
i mean i am out of ideas
have you tried going there without actually going and doing the secret on this screen
which colors did you not try yet?
I'm past the secrets so its all good :)
btw max sent dm of what it looked like the first time you entered
was there a hint regarding this screen?
i still think the most obvious thing would be entering when the background and warp colors match
but i think you already did that like three times
how tight could it reasonably be
this is the most blue yet
is it just me or are there specific shades of each main color that there is a tiny tiny delay before it starts shifting to the next color?
i really wonder if theres like a coherent hint for this somewhere
how would you even hint at this without just telling what to do

idk how to explain it, and it could just be me tripping, but like when it gets to the darkest shade of blue, there is a tiny pause before it starts shifting, so at the darkest shade of each color it looks like a tiny  pause.  but that could just be me not noticing subtle shade differences
would love to stick around and see what the solution is but its getting late and exam tomorrow so i should probably go to sleep soon
yeah I remember it being red, blue, yellow
the fact you figured that out..im going to an escape room on monday, can i borrow you for a day?  LUL
would be absurd if it was super strict on being an exact shade
think i got internet again what the fuck
does it make the bullets slower or the fight less dense
but it could be in farewell medley cuz u didn't 100% it...
doesnt even look like its getting easier to me lol, i cant notice
the more u progress the more it gets nerfed
is there a limit or will it eventually just become nothing
thats what it would take for me to clear it LUL
That would be so miserable to play lmao
make it so it only happens on final
god help us all, if fan gamers are tapped by governments to create ways to torture people lol
I swear some avoidances already do that
Make it retrieve first launch time from a server as well so you can't reset by just deleting the save
Just make the game the game harder to download than league
well if they know what the game does already, they could just like relaunch a lot to make it free
If max suddenly releases a new avoidance I'll be a bit sceptic
@elmurgamer he would release it under an alias
jesus christ why is it upside down
i wish to watch more breakdancing honestly
at least france won the battle of the bulge the 2nd time around
battle of the bulge was a historical battle
im quite terrible at history myself, so its prob not even accurate reference lol
I haven't seen vormanax be active in the community since 2014
wait,are there enough secrets to fill that entire cross with cubes?
speaking of segmented avoidances, I've been trying to do triple piano segmented
slow is like not happening but I'm hoping I can at least get there
that is the second time someone has been on the exact same floor has me in this game
why is one torch upside down?
that spot in the upper right part of the wall on 77 looks like it could be something if you can get back to that spot after inverting
CN2.5 secrets really make you a conspiracy theorist huh
that's like a block ceiling diamond
how do you get back down
i didn't catch it, is there a reason you do the whole loop before going down
society if vines let you jump off without wasting your double jump:
well that was a fun use of 20 minutes
pluto clearly kindly asked you to use the rat skin
mir told me you can get behind the wall from the first save but its like delta frame perfect
no idea how she did it
i just heard its some ass
max is a known IWM speedrunner. he can do it
I still can't believe they removed the boshy screen
Wow you figured out the 2.5 secret!
you pointed out the secret with your mouse pointer
one of the BEST songs in the game right here
you get to snek while smooth jazz is playing
its not too long of a game
but dont worry cause after this you have 24 secrets left!
